title: Cofco International Ships First Argentine Wheat Cargo to China
description: Cofco International Ltd. is loading the first bulk commercial shipment of Argentine wheat to China, kicking off a new trade flow between the two countries, the Chinese state-owned agricultural giant’s trading unit said in a statement on Saturday.
content: Cofco International Ltd. is loading the first bulk commercial shipment of Argentine wheat to China, kicking off a new trade flow between the two countries, the Chinese state-owned agricultural giant’s trading unit said in a statement on Saturday.
